step_feedback.feedback: Great job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Focus on making the motion a smooth circle.
Excellent control as you continue the circular motion. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer to your body for a more focused shoulder movement.
You're completing the repetitions well. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit for your ribs and breathing.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep up the smooth circular motions, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply as you move to help your lymphatic system and breathing.
